body: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J-Xm5nTDsDI This includes an OCN scrims highlights (with Avicus players)as well as some 1v1's against Faai.
body_tagged: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J-Xm5nTDsDI This includes an OCN scrims highlights (with Avicus players)as well as some 1v1's against Faai.
title: Montage #3!

replies.body: don't post non-avicus content in the section for avicus content
replies.body_tagged: don't post non-avicus content in the section for avicus content

replies.body:
I understand where you are coming from. But.... when there arent any scrim servers to play on... Anyway I specifically said that I uploaded because I was playing with Avicus players. Therefore, it is Avicus related content.  Also with making this post I hoped to raise awareness of my channel which is 90% Avicus content related. I wish I could upload Avicus content only but that is nearly impossible without scrimmages.

Sorry for the inconvinience,

Koja.
